item.text: Rescue workers, firefighters, paramedics, hazardous material handlers and emergency medical technicians all fall under this category.

Job Change Requirements An Acrobatics or Athletics Skill Modifier of +10 or greater, a Treat Injury Skill Modifier of +10 or greater and a Drive, Knowledge (Earth and Life sciences or Technology) or Ride Skill Modifier of +10 or greater.
Skills (2) Acrobatics, Athletics, Drive, Knowledge(Earth and Life science or Technology), Ride, or Treat Injury
Occupational Feats (1) First Aid Expert or Technosavant

box.text: Firefighters and Rescue Workers are issued a Turnout coat, and Paramedics/EMS and EMTs are issued a Standard First Aid Kit.
